articles.description: Both of the 43-year-old NFL star's leading ladies, past and present, gave him a congratulatory shout out on social media
articles.content:
NFL star Tom Brady scored his 10th Super Bowl on Sunday to cheers from both his leading ladies past and present.
The 43-year-old six-time Super Bowl champ's wife Gisele Bündchen shared a snap of her… [+3318 chars]

articles.author: Peter Carline
articles.title: Tom Brady heading to the Super Bowl for TENTH time after Tampa Bay Buccaneers victory - Daily Mail
articles.description: Brady owns six Super Bowl rings with New England and now heads to his 10th NFL championship game with his new team after a 31-26 victory over the Green Bay Packers.
articles.content:
Tom Brady on Sunday reached his tenth Super Bowl. 
The 43-year-old quarterback led the Tampa Bay Buccaneers to a compelling 31-26 win over the Green Bay Packers. In doing so, the Bucs will next mont… [+10588 chars]
